abstract: The St. Louis third baseman is hitting .308 this postseason with 10 runs batted in, a team high.
snippet: The St. Louis third baseman is hitting .308 this postseason with 10 runs batted in, a team high.
lead_paragraph: ST. LOUIS - David Freese, who hit his third home run of the postseason Monday night in Milwaukee, has been something of a revelation for those outside St. Louis, his hometown, who may not have heard of him before his recent outburst.

headline.main: Cardinals' Freese Has His Turn in the Spotlight
